name: #oct - World's best Oracle
description:
A life-changing oracle with incredibly many possibilities of response.
#oct helps you find the right answer to all your questions.
There are rumours that #oct gives you only random answers.
Thats a lie! *wink* *wink*

Benefits:
* Can save and say your name.
* This life-changing app can give you over 50 different answers.
* Simple and user-friendly design.
* No annoying ads.
* Has an amazing voice output.
* Ability for only Yes and No .
* Ability to control it with shaking your device or simply touching a button.
* #oct never lies (ok, thats a lie).

This app can help you in every life situation with a simple answer.

History of #oct:
#oct was founded in December 2015 by Goga B. and another person. The meaning of #oct is known to only a few people in the world. According to a legend, it is even the meaning of life. In December 2016 Goga decided to take the power of #oct and put it into an app. That's what came out, an omniscient oracle.








You still don't know what #o.c.t. means! Muahahaha
